title: League crashing whole computer while in game
body: When playing league and only league no other game just playing normally a couple minutes into the game my whole game crashes like a hard crash not just  a freeze or anything it makes my screen black and get distorted audio regardless if its league itself or my computer reacting in a strage way to league i would like to know if theres a way to find the source to crashes im going to 1st patch the game and then prob uninstall/reinstall and ill see from there but if anyone knows a way to find root cause of a crash that would be appreciated thanks in advanced

replies.body:
It sounds like your pc is really having some problems with League running. A healthy pc definitely shouldn't be crashing out of nowhere like that, and I want to make sure you get as much help as you need, so let's get you in touch with our tech guys. 

Use this [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to generate some game logs and shoot those to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to look over those logs and see what might be going on.
